snippet: A health care system has granted hospital-admitting privileges to doctors at North Dakota’s sole abortion provider, which would bring the Fargo clinic into compliance with a new state law.
abstract: Health care system Sanford Health grants hospital-admitting privileges to doctors at North Dakota’s sole abortion provider, which would bring the Fargo clinic into compliance with a new state law.
lead_paragraph: A health care system has granted hospital-admitting privileges to doctors at North Dakota’s sole abortion provider, which would bring the Fargo clinic into compliance with a new state law.

headline.main: North Dakota: Abortion Doctors Get Hospital Privileges
headline.print_headline: North Dakota: Abortion Doctors Get Hospital Privileges
